title: [Large-scale] Designing collaborative creative mathematics learning for middle school students

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematical computation skills and problem-solving experience
context.additional_context: Learners access an online learning platform via smartphones, with the goal of enhancing engagement through creative problem-solving and collaborative experiences.

learning_goals: Learners can present at least three personalized problem-solving strategies for math problems through collaborative design activities.
Learners can share math problem-solving processes with peers and exchange feedback using smartphone-based tools.
Learners can complete at least two creative design tasks that convert real-life problems into mathematical approaches.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
